name: Wormy's Dangerous Dig
description:
Help Wormy journey into the earth. Dig deeper and deeper and consume different foods for different effects. Yes, there is fire underground, I guess it is magma. Watch out for underground holes! Don't move into your own body. A twist on the classic Snake gameplay.

More details on the Ludum Dare page below.

Controls:

Arrow keys: Move
Y/C: Mute the music
X/V: Restart the current level
Enter: Pause menu, restart from here

Everything else should be explained in the game.

Source code can be found here.
